content.name: template_folder
content.explanation: Where you keep the template files. The path is relative to Meltano project directory.

content.name: use_async
content.explanation: Whether to send request in asynchronous mode.

content.name: dry_run
content.explanation: Whether to send request in dry-run mode.

content.name: write_record_limit
content.explanation: The maximum number of records to be written.
